paper.title: OPTIMIZED CLUSTERS FOR DISAGGREGATED ELECTRICITY LOAD FORECASTING
paper.abstract: To account for the variation of EDF's (the French electrical company) portfolio following the liberalization of the electrical market, it is essential to disaggregate the global load curve. The idea is to disaggregate the global signal in such a way that the sum of disaggregated forecasts significantly improves the prediction of the whole global signal. The strategy is to optimize, a preliminary clustering of individual load curves with respect to a predictability index. The optimized clustering procedure is controlled by a forecasting performance via a cross-prediction dissimilarity index. It can be assimilated to a discrete gradient type algorithm.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究电力负荷曲线的聚类和预测优化，应用于电力市场的负荷预测，并未明确指出其在衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等金融领域的应用。
